Name: Prismara
Desc: Cloaked in shimmering scales, this dragon haunts the Bloodstone Mountains, striking terror into the hearts of those who dare to venture near. With eyes like burning coals and a roar that echoes the wails of the damned, it feeds on fear, leaving only silence and despair in its wake.

Name: FrostFang
Desc: An Eternal beast that moves with an otherworldly grace, appearing and disappearing within the snow. Its ethereal form gives it an almost ghostly quality, making it a haunting figure in the winter night.
